A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Diehard Star Wars fan here\, and I have to agree with the rest of the folks... It was pretty bad. I don't have anything new to add\, other than it just didn't "feel" like what a Star Wars movie should be. And the sheer amount of tonally wrong humor\, irrelevant subplots\, and gaping plot holes just ruined it for me.

I don't have the slightest idea why critics seem to like this movie. If it wasn't "Star Wars" and strictly some other film\, it would be universally panned.

I hope that Episode IX can be salvaged. So sad.
